item.title: Use openpyxl - Convert to DataFrame in Pandas
item.description: Introduction Previously, I wrote several articles on working Excel files using openpyxl. Use openpyxl - open, save Excel files in Python Use openpyxl - create a new Worksheet, change sheet property in Python Use openpyxl - read and write Cell in Python In this article, I introduce how to convert openpyxl data to Pandas data format called DataFrame. Preparation Install modules First, install module with pip command. 1pip install openpyxl
